name: ufront-mvc
description: MVC Framework that is at the core of ufront.
releasenote:
Bump compiletime dependency
    Add configuration option (and defaults) for loading ufadmin modules.
    Add ability to use plain strings as templates (Instead of loading from a view engine)
    Add `controller.baseUri` and `controller.executeSubController(SubController)`
    Add new testing helpers
    Workaround for xml documentation error
    Add support for parsing dates in our routing
